question: Establishment of which of the following was a result of negotiation carried out in “Uruguay Round”?
explanation: The WTO is an inter-governmental organization for governments to negotiate global trade agreements and progressively liberalizing trade. Currently, WTO has 164 members. The WTO operates a system of trade rules that apply to all its members. It is located in Geneva, Switzerland. It was established on 1 January 1995 and its official languages are English, French and Spanish.
